segments.text: I'd like to invite you for dinner tonight . Do you think you'll have time ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thank you for your invitation . I'm free tonight .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Which kind of food do you like to eat , Chinese food , western food or seafood ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK . I will pick you up at your hotel at 5:30 p . m .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's fine . I'll be waiting for you .
segments.speaker: S2
